jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
Chief Technology Officer

Beautapp is the latest beauty retail technology that is set to adapt the way we shop for cosmetics goods both online and in-store.

With an enhanced shopping experience lined up for 2020 we are looking to appoint a Chief Technology Officer who is passionate about mobile apps to help us deliver Beautapp as a native iOS app/ PWA for our initial public launch.

To read more, please visit BEAUTAPP.COM and be sure to apply after reviewing the requirements below

Will suit you if:

• You want to secure a generous amount of % shares in a startup business with a strong revenue generating opportunity.

• You are looking to build your technological portfolio

• You are based in London

• You have proof of previous work and skillset

jobs.title: PWA / Native iOS App Developer
jobs.description:
PWA / Native iOS App Developer

Beautapp is the latest retail technology platform that is set to disrupt the way we shop for cosmetics goods both online and in-store.

With lots of new features lined up to enhance the customer shopping experience, we are looking to launch a streamlined first rollout on the App Store or as a PWA by Mid 2020.

The story so far - Beautapp has been verified by surveying beauty customers in Carnaby St and Covent Garden, meeting and discussing our strategy with leading beauty brands. We’ve previously been offered a “white label” deal with a leading US department store and had a well known global skincare brand signed monetary contributions.

To read more, please visit BEAUTAPP.COM and be sure to apply after reviewing the requirements below


Launching iOS

• To use the already built “Phase 1” prototype in developing the fully functional Beautapp platform on iOS

• Refine and optimise Design & UI

• Work in close collaboration with the Founder on features and UX

• Data management (collecting, managing, profilings and reporting)

• Various other technological troubleshooting and implementation


After launching iOS

• Android build

• Desktop web app and partner portal interface

• In-Store internal counter interface


Will suit someone who

• Wants to secure generous shares (% of the business allocated to the right candidate)

• Is reliable, accountable and efficient

• Exudes passion to innovate within the Retail Industry

• Has proven track record of launching apps on the Apple “App Store”

• Must have an existing App/PWA portfolio to share with your application

• Is available time start immediately

• Is London based
